description: Displays the status of various system caches in the admin interface
Reloads BBCode definitions from storage into the system cache
Clears all user session data from the cache
Reloads system modules configuration from the config directory
Reloads emoticon definitions into the system cache
Reloads user ranking definitions into the system cache
Displays detailed information about cached forum topics
Clears the cache for topics in a specific forum
Displays detailed information about cached forum posts
Clears the cache for posts in a specific topic
